QuestData.Title: The Maldraxxian Job
QuestData.Description:
We cannot hope to hold the Seat without a necropolis. Khaliiq reports that Vashj is ready to set her plan in motion.
Meet with her and the other Eyes at Nurakkir. Do what must be done.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet with Whisperer Vyn at Nurakkir.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet with Whisperer Vyn at Nurakkir.
QuestData.RewardText: We are pleased to see your return.
